mapper.select: select distinct rl.RECEIVER_NAME as USER_NAME, rl.RECEIVER_ID as RECEIVER_ID, ui.COUNTRY as COUNTRY, ui.INTRODUCE as INTRODUCE from USER_INFO ui left outer join RELATION_LIST rl on ui.USER_NAME = rl.RECEIVER_NAME where rl.RECEIVER_NAME like concat('%', #{mentorSearch}, '%') or ui.COUNTRY like concat('%', #{mentorSearch}, '%') and rl.MENTOR = 'Y' and rl.PERMIT = 'Y'
